tool_description: With This API you can enter a URL and the API will let you know if it is secure.
title: Secure Web App

api_list.name: url
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to check if a site is on a secure connection

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: This endpoint will check websites and let you know if the site is secure.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://secure-web-app.p.rapidapi.com/url"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "secure-web-app.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
